name: OverWare - An Overwatch Fangame! [GAME JAM]
description:
OverWare is an Overwatch fan-game made for MFGG Winter Game Jam 2021,

OverWare is a collection of WarioWare-esque microgames, featuring Some of your favourite Overwatch characters (if your favourite Overwatch character is Mercy).

Click, drag and jump your way to a high score!

Features:

  • 15 Microgames!
  • All games use WASD, Spacebar or Left mouse.
  • Cute soundeffects!
  • Animations for completing most minigames!
  • Animations for failing most minigames!
  • Microgames are shuffled to avoid getting the same one constantly!

What Went Well

  • The actual minigames themselves!
  • The sound effects that really add polish
  • The art drawn by myself
  • The success/Failure animations
  • Shuffling the microgames to avoid repetition

What could have gone better

  • Difficulty - at the moment the game feels a bit too easy
  • Fluidity of round change - could be a bit faster
  • The amount of microgames - I originally aimed for 20 and scrapped a few to be able to finish in time

Credits

  • Programming by @NiandraWasTaken
  • Drawn art by @NiandraWasTaken
  • Overwatch map backgrounds by Activision Blizzard
  • Alert sound from Metal Gear Solid
  • Sound Effects from freesound.org
  • Silly Intro by Alexander Nakarada
  • Monkeys Spinning Monkeys by Kevin MacLeod

Disclaimer

This is a parody game made for fun and not for profit. Overwatch characters do not belong to me, neither do the map backgrounds used.
